root.name: Hunting Unlimited 4
root.description: FeaturesOver 50 hunting scenarios ("challenges") to choose from "Free hunt" mode offering endless combinations of random hunting situations Choose your prey from 15 species of game to hunt 25 weapons to pick from 25 hunting accessories, calls and lures at your disposal 6 expansive regions Go on Safari hunt! Take part in tournaments, compare your score online Dedicated fan community creating user-built challenges to keep the game fresh
